name: asciidoctor-reveal.js
description: A Reveal.js converter for Asciidoctor and Asciidoctor.js. Write your slides in AsciiDoc!
readme:
# Reveal.js converter for Asciidoctor

[Asciidoctor reveal.js](https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor-reveal.js) is a converter for [Asciidoctor](https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor) and [Asciidoctor.js](https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor.js) that transforms an AsciiDoc document into an HTML5 presentation designed to be executed by the [reveal.js](http://lab.hakim.se/reveal-js/) presentation framework.

This is the npm module. For setup instructions and the AsciiDoc syntax to use to write a presentation see the module's documentation at [https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor-reveal.js](https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor-reveal.js).
